7922c3aa-2295-4fcc-88fa-32bae5831295: Dash does not end the Soldier's movement for the {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}. Enemies adjacent to the starting point of Dash will consider the Soldier their lowest {g|Encyclopedia:PriorityTarget}priority target{/g} during their next turn.
8feb2b2c-5ed1-439a-8915-21670a0a5830: Revel in Slaughter can be used after 2 kills instead of 3.
df30d572-41ad-4448-ab28-1789ed875070:
A Soldier is a master of all {g|Encyclopedia:Range}ranged{/g} weapons, quickly able to assume an advantageous position, from where they stand ready to rain fire on the enemy. While well-trained in a highly diverse range of arms, a Soldier is particularly proficient at blasting their targets with {g|Encyclopedia:BurstAttacksGlossary}burst{/g} fire and area weapons.
Core focus: movement and ranged attacks, {g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}cover{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g}, burst fire, {g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}area attacks{/g}.
2c19798f-ab43-4783-a679-44fdab396b4a: Allows the character to use bolt weapons, such as bolter or bolt pistol.
5354a9a0-92c7-43fe-b74f-b1313f8e186c: Allows the character to use flame weapons, such as a flamer, heavy flamer, and hand flamer.
79c65f56-6d62-453e-bbcc-bb739de0b77d: Attacks with the chosen {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee{/g} weapon are 20% harder to {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}parry{/g}. Its {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}armour penetration{/g} are increased by +2.
19713c81-fe5c-427b-876d-3d7e8a755526: Attacks with the chosen {g|Encyclopedia:Range}ranged{/g} weapon gain a +20% {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} to {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit chance{/g}. Its {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}armour penetration{/g} are increased by +2.
13d8bf98-daf5-4c73-b75d-c19ecbec4092: Attacks with the chosen {g|Encyclopedia:Range}ranged{/g} weapon gain a +20% {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} to {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit chance{/g}. Its {g|Encyclopedia:Recoil}recoil{/g} is reduced by −25% and its {g|Encyclopedia:RateOfFire}rate of fire{/g} is increased by +25% (by at least 1 shot).
1c8c485a-d4c0-44a3-9816-99e1f81367d7: Each shot fired by the Soldier grants them +1 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agility{/g} until the end of their next {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}.
29e2e1c2-b6b4-42e8-b9c8-49f86da0d8d2: Enemies {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damaged{/g} by the Soldier's {g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}area attacks{/g} suffer +{uip|DamageBonus|3feb70e54f244b0e96053909f4533606} damage from the next attack that {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hits{/g} them.
36577311-c15d-4c83-ab7e-bc3198203928: For each adjacent ally, the Soldier deals +{uip|BonusDamage|09204d361b6d4fb786842e43ac1979db}% more {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} to enemies.
6b796633-2302-4fa5-814c-55e53c22bd9b:
Healing an ally with a medikit in combat restores additional {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g} equal to <u>({g|Encyclopedia:SkillMedicae}Medicae{/g} / 10)</u>.
Using medikits costs −1 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g} less.
dda2b809-54cd-4fda-8b63-b8e9b0e36684: If the Soldier attacks before using Run and Gun, their next attack after its use gains +3% {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}critical hit chance{/g} for each cell between the Soldier's position at the moment of the attack before using Run and Gun and their position at the moment of the next attack after use.
d0c9b9dc-bbce-4aa5-b34f-8e629eee3dc8: If the Soldier {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hits{/g} an enemy twice with one {g|Encyclopedia:BurstAttacksGlossary}burst{/g} attacks, the second hit will deal additional {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} equal to the damage of the first hit.
2186ef95-a212-45e8-beb7-8fb49b68229a: If there are allies in the {g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}area of effect{/g} of the Soldier's area attack, enemies in the area suffer a −{uip|DodgePenalty|661f9a1ac69f44fc881366af05f7c502}% {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalty{/g} to {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g} and a −{uip|ArmourPenalty|661f9a1ac69f44fc881366af05f7c502}% penalty to {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g} against that attack.
cf88e534-8c2c-49f2-aa8e-a8a01cbd11d3: The Soldier gains +{uip|CritChanceBonus|bcdbde555de5492abae33d0dc285c956}% {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}critical hit chance{/g}. This {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} is doubled against enemies from which the Soldier is protected by {g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}cover{/g} at the moment of the attack.
6c56e757-a5f5-4b11-82a3-d0d8bd3833aa: The Soldier gains +{uip|MovementPoints|5e60764f84c94277ae6a78b63a1fd2aa} {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g}. Their next attack costs −1 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g} less and does not count toward the attack limit per {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}. Until the end of the next turn, the Soldier becomes winded. While winded, the Soldier suffers a −10 {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalty{/g} to {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}Ballistic Skill{/g} and cannot use Run and Gun.
12a1151a-eb0f-4964-9f68-b743d4af09e5:
The Soldier gains the {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g} to make a number of extra attacks equal to their weapon's {g|Encyclopedia:RateOfFire}rate of fire{/g} (minimum 2), using the weapon attack that normally costs the least {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g}. These attacks do not spend AP.
-<indent=5%>Until the end of the Soldier's {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, their first attack against each new enemy automatically scores a {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}critical hit{/g}.</indent>
-<indent=5%>The Soldier immediately {g|Encyclopedia:Reload}reloads{/g} their current weapon.</indent>
e4e8c61e-9f08-4a0b-abb3-71084a6750d8:
The Soldier gains the {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g} to make a number of extra attacks equal to their weapon's {g|Encyclopedia:RateOfFire}rate of fire{/g} (minimum 2), using the weapon attack that normally costs the least {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g}. These attacks do not spend AP.
-<indent=5%>Until the end of the Soldier's {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, their first attack against each new enemy automatically scores a {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}critical hit{/g}.</indent>
-<indent=5%>The Soldier immediately {g|Encyclopedia:Reload}reloads{/g} their current weapon.</indent>
-<indent=5%>Starting from the next {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g} and until the end of combat, the Soldier's AP are reduced by −1.</indent>
0db23d74-d7a2-43c4-b473-bd3f9d81689b: The Soldier gives a sign that they are about to open fire. The Soldier and their allies will automatically {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g} the Soldier's next attack.
d6c4053c-da58-4c97-a3eb-aac5a8138668: The Soldier immediately dashes in the selected direction, spending all their {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}movement points{/g}. Does not provoke {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}attacks of opportunity{/g}. Allows the Soldier to dash through allies and enemies but not through obstacles.{br} Can only be used once per {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}.
d77c552f-81b1-48a3-b603-ad6c1ac25310: The Soldier immediately spends all their {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g} and gains a +30% {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} to {g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}cover efficiency{/g}. The next time the Soldier uses Run and Gun, they gain back all spent AP and MP plus 1 additional AP. It also resets the {g|Encyclopedia:Cooldown}cooldown{/g} of all other Soldier's {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}abilities{/g} except for Run and Gun.
7dc753d9-99a6-4a8f-a02d-ceb9a745ef84: The Soldier suffers a −10 {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalty{/g} to {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}Ballistic Skill{/g} and cannot use Run and Gun.
9d7616c1-a02b-416e-bd1c-cdb221886dab: The Soldier's first grenade use in combat does not spend {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g} and does not count toward the attack limit that {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}.
35bf69ee-e6dc-419a-bbc5-40abbe5c0ac1: The Soldier's grazing {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}area attacks{/g} deal 75% {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} instead of 50%.
f13d19f5-45ef-4f72-a4b5-8f7aababeeb2:
The Soldier's next {g|Encyclopedia:BurstAttacksGlossary}burst{/g} attacks will have its {g|Encyclopedia:RateOfFire}rate of fire{/g} doubled but deal −25% less {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g}. All the shots will follow random trajectories.
Only works with weapons capable of burst fire.
961f28f9-d598-4fbe-a565-79c8be2f0925: The Soldier's second attack action in a {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g} deals +{uip|DamageBonus|1c82d5f20dfb4e8ab89f78a4adad66a5}% more {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} to enemies that have not suffered damage from the Soldier during this turn.
443fd153-5df8-47d1-8cf9-b1742cff6ccb: The Soldier's {g|Encyclopedia:MediumArmour}medium armour{/g} does not reduce {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g}.
b6935da8-d6be-40d2-be43-b5cfa5fb727a: The first {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit{/g} of each {g|Encyclopedia:BurstAttacksGlossary}burst{/g} attacks deals additional {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} equal to the weapon's current {g|Encyclopedia:RateOfFire}rate of fire{/g}.
09d62719-a598-4fd8-bc52-0f6c1a96fedb: The next use of Run and Gun, when used after Entrench, grants an additional +{unit_stat|WarhammerAgility|bonus} {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}movement points{/g}.
5f422703-2ba3-4cd4-92bb-22445956db43:
Until the end of combat, all of the Soldier's attacks are 20% harder to {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g}.
Until the end of combat, the Soldier's {g|Encyclopedia:Range}ranged{/g} attacks gain +10% {g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}armour penetration{/g}.
d7ab3e1f-6f16-417e-a24e-6cae6a131914: Until the end of combat, the Soldier's {g|Encyclopedia:RateOfFire}rate of fire{/g} is increased by +30%.
753c45bb-e968-4bda-a019-2c0facd6faf3: Until the end of the Soldier's {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, each of their {g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}area attacks{/g} deals additional {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} equal to the number of attacked targets.
52e91cd6-7f59-4cfb-b241-dfeea90b5e39: Until the end of the Soldier's {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, they gain +4 {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g} and their attacks do not spend MP.
8c9a2b1a-98af-4cd0-b2f7-a77f098d3f7c: When firing heavy weapons, {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}critical hit chance{/g} is increased by +<u>{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}BS{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g}</u>% and critical {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} is increased by +<u>(3 × BS bonus)</u>%.
19ad09af-61ee-49e7-a577-4807e2408a2f: Whenever the Soldier deals {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g}, their {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}critical damage{/g} is increased by +1% until the end of combat.
73afc8f6-4a93-4613-bae5-c72d98abcabe: Whenever the Soldier successfully {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodges{/g} or uses {g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}cover{/g} against an enemy's attack, they gain a guaranteed {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}critical hit{/g} against that enemy.
8b59ee80-4f37-46b3-b94a-a7897c8ccb93: While at full {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g}, the Soldier has +10 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}Ballistic Skill{/g} and +2 {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g}.
7732ccd6-d280-4cf6-8a5c-f9e7b759984a: While the Soldier has an ally adjacent to them, Controlled Shot costs −1 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g} less to use.
737a4fd7-4ffc-4c63-b551-a8e0a549634c: While the Soldier has {g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}full cover{/g} against an enemy, the Soldier gains +10% {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} against that enemy, and the enemy's attacks deal −20% less damage against the Soldier and their cover if the cover is present at the moment when the shot is fired (even if the cover is destroyed by the shot).
13fa6eca-8de3-4f2d-9115-261f125d5644: {g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}Cover efficiency{/g} is increased by +10% for full cover and +20% for half cover.
281cd08e-1919-4947-8d1d-f2ba64c5bb9f: {g|Encyclopedia:Reload}Reloading{/g} costs −2 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g} less (minimum 1). The first reload in a combat does not cost AP.
